frontmatter.title: msgmover | Coffee Series
frontmatter.description: The Discord Bot for Moving Messages Between Channels and Servers. Copy messages from one channel to another, or continuously relay messages to other channels/servers. Make moving messages between channels/servers easy and integrated, using webhooks.

headings.value: The bot is returning an error in sending messages
